bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-draftgroups: Label for the multiselect configuration that allows to set a list of user groups, that are allowed to see pages, that are not approved yet
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autoreview: Label for the checkbox configuration that when checked, automatically approves the page when the workflow was finished successfully
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autodeletew: Label for the checkbox configuration that when checked, automatically deletes the workflow, when a page was marked as stable
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-indexingsta: Label for the checkbox configuration that when checked, causes only stable versions of pages to be indexed
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flaggedrevshisto:
Label for the date on that the page was set to stable.
{{Identical|Stable date}}

Label for the title of the page that was set to stable.
{{Identical|Page}}

Label for the comment that was given when the page was set to stable.
{{Identical|Stable comment}}

Label for the list of page titles that have been stable.
{{Identical|Stable pages}}

Label for the list of page titles that have not been stable.
{{Identical|Not stable pages}}Not stable pages

Label for the page title that is not in a namepsace with approval control.
{{Identical|Not FlaggedRevs namespace}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-addstabledatetoc:
Status message for a page, that is not approved.
{{Identical|Not stable}}

Status message for a page, that is approved.
{{Identical|Stable}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-unmarked:
Status message for the state of the page when it is not approved and never was in the past.
{{Identical|First draft}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-stable:
Status message for the state of the page when it is approved.
{{Identical|Approved}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft:
Status message for the state of the page when it is not approved, but was at least once in the past.
{{Identical|Draft}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-implicit-d:
Status message for the state of the page when it is approved, but was implicit changes such as inclusions.
{{Identical|Implicit draft}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-notenabled:
Status message for the state of the page when the approval functionality is not enabled.
{{Identical|Not enabled}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-unmarked-d: Description of the state of the page when it is not approved and never was in the past.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-pending:
Status message for the state of the page when there is pending changes.
{{Identical|Pending changes}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-stable-des: Description of the state of the page when it is approved
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft-desc:
Description of the state of the page when it is not approved, but was at least once in the past. Should link to the history of the current page and to the stable version.
* $1 - number of changes to be reviewed.
* $2 - Date of the last approval.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-notenabled: Description of the state of the page when the approval functionality is not enabled
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-pending-de:
Description of the state of the page when there is pending changes.
* $1 - URL to the pending version of the page, that shows further information
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-review-heading:
Heading of the client side dialog that allowes approval of the current page.
{{Identical|Approval}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-review-help: Description in the client side dialog that allowes approval of the current page. It should ask the user, if the user wants to proceed
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-review-comment-l:
Label for the comment text field in the client side dialog that allowes to add a comment to the approval of the current page.
{{Identical|Comment}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-label-flaggedrev:
Label for the NameSpaceManager integration checkbox, that allowes to en-/disable FlaggedRevs per on a namespace basis.
{{Identical|Approval}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-bookshelfsh: Label for the checkbox configuration that, when checked, lists the approved pages in the BlueSpiceBookshelf extension
Label for the checkbox configuration that, when checked, lists the non approved pages in the BlueSpiceBookshelf extension
Label for the checkbox configuration that, when checked, lists the pages that are not under version control in the BlueSpiceBookshelf extension
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-uemodulepdf: Label for the checkbox configuration that, when checked, lists the approval state of the inluded pages in the BlueSpiceUniversalExport extension
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-sl-flaggedrevs-s:
Label for column header in BlueSpiceWikiExplorer integration, that lists the approval state of pages.
{{Identical|Approved}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-sl-flaggedrevs-d:
Label for column header in BlueSpiceWikiExplorer integration, that lists the approval date of pages.
{{Identical|Approval date}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-sl-flaggedrevs-i:
Label for column header in BlueSpiceWikiExplorer integration, that lists if the approval state of pages is pending.
{{Identical|Approval pending}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-response-success: Response message to the user when the page was successfully reviewed and will now be reloaded.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-response-failure: Response message to the user when there was an error while reviewing the page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-history-row-fr-i:
Combined message for approved revisions in the history view.
* $1 - Timestamp of the approval
* $2 - Html link to the userpage of the user, that made this approval.
* $3 - Comment of the user, that made this approval
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-invalid-namespac:
Error message when given namespace or multiple given namespaces are invalid.
* $1 - number of namespaces given, that are invalid. Use PLURAL.
* $2 - Comma seperated list of namespaces given, that are invalid. Use PLURAL
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-column-last-stab:
Column header that lists approval dates of pages.
{{Identical|Reviewed}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-no-stable:
Column content that shows the default information, when the page is not approved yet.
{{Identical|not reviewed}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-notification-pag:
Notification summary that describes who approved what page.
* $1 - username of the user that approved the page.
* $2 - Name of the page, that was approved
* $3 - Name of the page, that was approved

Notification subject that describes, what page was approved.
* $1 - username of the user that approved the page.
* $2 - Name of the page, that was approved
* $3 - Name of the page, that was approved

Notification body that describes, who approved what page.
* $1 - username of the user that approved the page.
* $2 - Name of the page, that was approved
* $3 - Name of the page, that was approved
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-document-state-s:
Alias for semantic property "QM/Document state" that carries the information of the approval status of the page. Must use prefix "QM/".
{{Identical|QM/Document state}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-approval-date-se:
Alias for semantic property "QM/Approval date" that carries the information of the approval date of the page. Must use prefix "QM/".
{{Identical|QM/Approval date}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-approval-user-se:
Alias for semantic property "QM/Approval by" that carries the information about the user, that approved the page. Must use prefix "QM/".
{{Identical|QM/Approval by}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-document-version:
Alias for semantic property "QM/Document version" that carries the number of approved versions of the page. Must use prefix "QM/".
{{Identical|QM/Document version}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-document-state-s:
Description for semantic property "QM/Document state" that carries the information of the approval status of the page. Possible values are:
* <nowiki>{{int:bs-flaggedrevsconnector-smw-prop-document-state-unapproved}}</nowiki>(there is no approved versions of this page)
* <nowiki>{{int:bs-flaggedrevsconnector-smw-prop-document-state-approved}}</nowiki>(latest version has been approved)
* <nowiki>{{int:bs-flaggedrevsconnector-smw-prop-document-state-in-revision}}</nowiki>(latest revision is a draft version of that page)
* <nowiki>{{int:bs-flaggedrevsconnector-smw-prop-document-state-approval-requested}}</nowiki>(a review workflow has been started on the existing draft version).
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-approval-date-se: Description for semantic property "QM/Approval date" that carries the information of the approval date and time of the successful review of that page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-approval-user-se: Alias for semantic property "QM/Approval by" that carries the information about the user, that approved the page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-document-version: Description for semantic property "QM/Document version" that carries the number of approved versions of the page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-smw-prop-documen:
Possible value for semantic property "QM/Document state" that carries the information of the approval status of the page.
{{Identical|Not approved}}

Possible value for semantic property "QM/Document state" that carries the information of the approval status of the page.
{{Identical|Approved}}

Possible value for semantic property "QM/Document state" that carries the information of the approval status of the page.
{{Identical|In revision}}

Possible value for semantic property "QM/Document state" that carries the information of the approval status of the page.
{{Identical|Approval requested}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-title:
Heading for the client side panel that shows the status of the page and possible user input fields to approve it.
{{Identical|Page approval}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-intro: Description for the client side panel that shows the status of the page and possible user input fields to approve it.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-nav-link-title:
Link text in ui, that opens a flyout where the user sees state of this page and has possible inputs to approve it.
{{Identical|Approval}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-state-int: Heading for the approval state section in the flyout of the ui.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-form-titl: Heading of the formular that allowes the user to approve the page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-body-hint:
Hint for outstanding draft versions
* $1 - Number of draft versions. Use PLURAL.
* $2 - Comma seperated links in HTML of userpages of the users, that made these draft versions of the page

Hont when the page is approved, but there is changes its resources.
{{Identical|changes to resources}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pagetool-switcht:
Text for link that allowes the user to switch to the draft version of this page.
{{Identical|Draft version}}
Title/hint for link that allowes the user to switch to the draft version of this page.

Text for link that allowes the user to switch to the approved version of this page.
{{Identical|Approved version}}
Title/hint for link that allowes the user to switch to the approved version of this page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pipe-separator:
Seperator in history view that seperates the commat from the other approval data
{{notranslate}}
qmoverview:
Special page name for [[Special:QMOverview]] special page
{{Identical|Quality management overview}}
bs-qmoverview-desc: Description of [[Special:QMOverview]] special page, that has an overview of pages in approval process
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-grid-page-id:
Short heading for the page id column in the quality manager overview
{{Identical|Page id}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-grid-page-title:
Short heading for the page title column in the quality manager overview
{{Identical|Page title}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-grid-rev-state:
Short heading for the approval state column in the quality manager overview
{{Identical|State}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-grid-pending-rev:
Short heading for the pending revisions column in the quality manager overview
{{Identical|Revisions since stable}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-grid-page-catego: Short heading for page categories column in the quality manager overview
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-privacy-transpar:
Message for combined data per row in BlueSpicePrivacy integration about FlaggedRevs
* $1 - Name of the page, the user has flagged
* $2 - Id of the revision that was flagged
* $3 - Timestamp, when this revision was flagged
* $4 - Comma seperated string of aliases of flags used in this flagging
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-admin-tool-overv:
Text of the link to the [[Special:QMOverview]] special page
{{Identical|Quality management overview}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-draft-lockdown-r:
Used to describe that the requested permission for this page is only available for users, that are member of a group or member of one of a comma separated list of groups
* $1 - Name of the requested action
* $2 - Number of allowed groups. Use PLURAL
* $3 - Single group or comma separated list of groups, that are allowed to access the action on this page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pageinfoelement-:
Last part of the page info element sentence that informs, that the current page has a draft version.
{{Identical|has a draft version}}

Button text of the page info element, that opens the draft version of the current page.
{{Identical|Show draft version}}

Last part of the page info element sentence that informs, that the current page has an approved version.
{{Identical|has an approved version}}

Button text of the page info element, that opens the approved version of the current page.
{{Identical|Show approved version}}

Part in sentence builder of the page info element that states, that the current page is a draft.
{{Identical|a draft}}

Tooltip in sentence builder of the page info element that states, that the current page is a draft.
{{Identical|Draft version}}

Part in sentence builder of the page info element that states, that the current page is a first draft.
{{Identical|a first draft}}

Tooltip in sentence builder of the page info element that states, that the current page is a first draft.
{{Identical|First draft version}}

Part in sentence builder of the page info element that states, that the current page is approved.
{{Identical|approved}}

Tooltip in sentence builder of the page info element that states, that the current page is approved.
{{Identical|Approved version}}

Text for button that starts the quick approvel for the curretn page.
{{Identical|Approve}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-collection-type-:
Label for source type "flaggedpages-cat" in entry field "type"
{{Identical|Approval by category}}

Label for source type "flaggedpages-ns" in entry field "type"
{{Identical|Approval by namespace}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pageinfoelement-:
Label for version switch button in page info element.
{{Identical|Show difference}}

Tooltip for version switch button in page info element.
{{Identical|Show difference}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-implicit-d: Info text in alert provider when the current page is approved, but there is changes to the included resources
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft-reso: Info text in alert provider when the current page is a draft due to changes to the included resources
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-handleinclu:
Label for the dropdown configuration that allows to set the handle type for the extension "FlaggedRevs"
{{Identical|Include handling}}

Label for the "current" option in the handle type dropdown for the extension "FlaggedRevs"
{{Identical|Current versions}}

Label for the "freeze" option in the handle type dropdown for the extension "FlaggedRevs"
{{Identical|Freeze versions}}

Label for the "stable" option in the handle type dropdown for the extension "FlaggedRevs"
{{Identical|Stable versions}}
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-resource-changes: Section title for the list of included resources that changed since the last page approval
